author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This is a draft PR to try on updating L1TrackTrigger to DD4hep. There are questions to discuss including
- Do we still need to check the supported geometry? It is currently hardcoding on XML filename

#### PR validation:
- Testing

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport, and no need to backport
title: [Not to merge] Update L1TrackTrigger step to DD4hep
